verses.verse: Moreover thou shalt make<WH6213> the tabernacle<WH4908> with ten<WH6235> curtains<WH3407> of fine twined linen,<WH8336> <WH7806> and blue,<WH8504> and purple,<WH713> and scarlet:<WH8438> <WH8144> with cherubims<WH3742> of cunning<WH2803> work<WH4639> shalt thou make<WH6213> them.

The length<WH753> of one<WH259> curtain<WH3407> shall be eight<WH8083> and twenty<WH6242> cubits,<WH520> and the breadth<WH7341> of one<WH259> curtain<WH3407> four<WH702> cubits:<WH520> and every one<WH3605> of the curtains<WH3407> shall have one<WH259> measure.<WH4060>

The five<WH2568> curtains<WH3407> shall be<WH1961> coupled together<WH2266> one<WH802> to<WH413> another;<WH269> and other five<WH2568> curtains<WH3407> shall be coupled<WH2266> one<WH802> to<WH413> another.<WH269>

And thou shalt make<WH6213> loops<WH3924> of blue<WH8504> upon<WH5921> the edge<WH8193> of the one<WH259> curtain<WH3407> from the selvage<WH4480> <WH7098> in the coupling;<WH2279> and likewise<WH3651> shalt thou make<WH6213> in the uttermost<WH7020> edge<WH8193> of another curtain,<WH3407> in the coupling<WH4225> of the second.<WH8145>

Fifty <WH2572> loops<WH3924> shalt thou make<WH6213> in the one<WH259> curtain,<WH3407> and fifty<WH2572> loops<WH3924> shalt thou make<WH6213> in the edge<WH7097> of the curtain<WH3407> that<WH834> is in the coupling<WH4225> of the second;<WH8145> that the loops<WH3924> may take hold<WH6901> one<WH802> of<WH413> another.<WH269>

And thou shalt make<WH6213> fifty<WH2572> taches<WH7165> of gold,<WH2091> and couple<WH2266> <WH853> the curtains<WH3407> together<WH802> <WH413> <WH269> with the taches:<WH7165> and it shall be<WH1961> one<WH259> tabernacle.<WH4908>
And thou shalt make<WH6213> curtains<WH3407> of goats'<WH5795> hair to be a covering<WH168> upon<WH5921> the tabernacle:<WH4908> eleven<WH6249> <WH6240> curtains<WH3407> shalt thou make.<WH6213>

The length<WH753> of one<WH259> curtain<WH3407> shall be thirty<WH7970> cubits,<WH520> and the breadth<WH7341> of one<WH259> curtain<WH3407> four<WH702> cubits:<WH520> and the eleven<WH6249> <WH6240> curtains<WH3407> shall be all of one<WH259> measure.<WH4060>

And thou shalt couple<WH2266> <WH853> five<WH2568> curtains<WH3407> by themselves,<WH905> and six<WH8337> curtains<WH3407> by themselves,<WH905> and shalt double<WH3717> the sixth<WH8345> <WH853> curtain<WH3407> in the forefront<WH413> <WH4136> <WH6440> of the tabernacle.<WH168>

And thou shalt make<WH6213> fifty<WH2572> loops<WH3924> on<WH5921> the edge<WH8193> of the one<WH259> curtain<WH3407> that is outermost<WH7020> in the coupling,<WH2279> and fifty<WH2572> loops<WH3924> in<WH5921> the edge<WH8193> of the curtain<WH3407> which coupleth<WH2279> the second.<WH8145>

And thou shalt make<WH6213> fifty<WH2572> taches<WH7165> of brass,<WH5178> and put<WH935> <WH853> the taches<WH7165> into the loops,<WH3924> and couple the tent together,<WH2266> <WH853> <WH168> that it may be<WH1961> one.<WH259>

And the remnant<WH5629> that remaineth<WH5736> of the curtains<WH3407> of the tent,<WH168> the half<WH2677> curtain<WH3407> that remaineth,<WH5736> shall hang<WH5628> over<WH5921> the backside<WH268> of the tabernacle.<WH4908>

And a cubit<WH520> on the one side,<WH4480> <WH2088> and a cubit<WH520> on the other side<WH4480> <WH2088> of that which remaineth<WH5736> in the length<WH753> of the curtains<WH3407> of the tent,<WH168> it shall<WH1961> hang<WH5628> over<WH5921> the sides<WH6654> of the tabernacle<WH4908> on this side<WH4480> <WH2088> and on that side,<WH4480> <WH2088> to cover<WH3680> it.
And thou shalt make<WH6213> a covering<WH4372> for the tent<WH168> of rams'<WH352> skins<WH5785> dyed red,<WH119> and a covering<WH4372> above<WH4480> <WH4605> of badgers'<WH8476> skins.<WH5785>
And thou shalt make<WH6213> <WH853> boards<WH7175> for the tabernacle<WH4908> of shittim<WH7848> wood<WH6086> standing up.<WH5975>
Ten <WH6235> cubits<WH520> shall be the length<WH753> of a board,<WH7175> and a cubit<WH520> and a half<WH2677> shall be the breadth<WH7341> of one<WH259> board.<WH7175>

Two <WH8147> tenons<WH3027> shall there be in one<WH259> board,<WH7175> set in order<WH7947> one<WH802> against<WH413> another:<WH269> thus<WH3651> shalt thou make<WH6213> for all<WH3605> the boards<WH7175> of the tabernacle.<WH4908>
And thou shalt make<WH6213> <WH853> the boards<WH7175> for the tabernacle,<WH4908> twenty<WH6242> boards<WH7175> on the south<WH5045> side<WH6285> southward.<WH8486>

And thou shalt make<WH6213> forty<WH705> sockets<WH134> of silver<WH3701> under<WH8478> the twenty<WH6242> boards;<WH7175> two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under<WH8478> one<WH259> board<WH7175> for his two<WH8147> tenons,<WH3027> and two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under<WH8478> another<WH259> board<WH7175> for his two<WH8147> tenons.<WH3027>
And for the second<WH8145> side<WH6763> of the tabernacle<WH4908> on the north<WH6828> side<WH6285> there shall be twenty<WH6242> boards: <WH7175>
And their forty<WH705> sockets<WH134> of silver;<WH3701> two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under<WH8478> one<WH259> board,<WH7175> and two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under<WH8478> another<WH259> board.<WH7175>
And for the sides<WH3411> of the tabernacle<WH4908> westward<WH3220> thou shalt make<WH6213> six<WH8337> boards.<WH7175>
And two<WH8147> boards<WH7175> shalt thou make<WH6213> for the corners<WH4742> of the tabernacle<WH4908> in the two sides.<WH3411>

And they shall be<WH1961> coupled together<WH8382> beneath,<WH4480> <WH4295> and they shall be<WH1961> coupled together<WH8382> above<WH3162> <WH5921> the head<WH7218> of it unto<WH413> one<WH259> ring:<WH2885> thus<WH3651> shall it be<WH1961> for them both;<WH8147> they shall be<WH1961> for the two<WH8147> corners.<WH4740>

And they shall be<WH1961> eight<WH8083> boards,<WH7175> and their sockets<WH134> of silver,<WH3701> sixteen<WH8337> <WH6240> sockets;<WH134> two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under<WH8478> one<WH259> board,<WH7175> and two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under<WH8478> another<WH259> board.<WH7175>
And thou shalt make<WH6213> bars<WH1280> of shittim<WH7848> wood;<WH6086> five<WH2568> for the boards<WH7175> of the one<WH259> side<WH6763> of the tabernacle,<WH4908>

And five<WH2568> bars<WH1280> for the boards<WH7175> of the other<WH8145> side<WH6763> of the tabernacle,<WH4908> and five<WH2568> bars<WH1280> for the boards<WH7175> of the side<WH6763> of the tabernacle,<WH4908> for the two sides<WH3411> westward.<WH3220>
And the middle<WH8484> bar<WH1280> in the midst<WH8432> of the boards<WH7175> shall reach<WH1272> from<WH4480> end<WH7097> to<WH413> end.<WH7097>

And thou shalt overlay<WH6823> the boards<WH7175> with gold,<WH2091> and make<WH6213> their rings<WH2885> of gold<WH2091> for places<WH1004> for the bars:<WH1280> and thou shalt overlay<WH6823> <WH853> the bars<WH1280> with gold.<WH2091>
And thou shalt rear up<WH6965> <WH853> the tabernacle<WH4908> according to the fashion<WH4941> thereof which<WH834> was showed<WH7200> thee in the mount.<WH2022>

And thou shalt make<WH6213> a veil<WH6532> of blue,<WH8504> and purple,<WH713> and scarlet,<WH8438> <WH8144> and fine twined linen<WH8336> <WH7806> of cunning<WH2803> work:<WH4639> with cherubims<WH3742> shall it be made: <WH6213>

And thou shalt hang<WH5414> it upon<WH5921> four<WH702> pillars<WH5982> of shittim<WH7848> wood overlaid<WH6823> with gold:<WH2091> their hooks<WH2053> shall be of gold,<WH2091> upon<WH5921> the four<WH702> sockets<WH134> of silver.<WH3701>

And thou shalt hang up<WH5414> <WH853> the veil<WH6532> under<WH8478> the taches,<WH7165> that thou mayest bring in<WH935> thither<WH8033> within<WH4480> <WH1004> the veil<WH6532> <WH853> the ark<WH727> of the testimony:<WH5715> and the veil<WH6532> shall divide<WH914> unto you between<WH996> the holy<WH6944> place and the most holy.<WH6944> <WH6944>
And thou shalt put<WH5414> <WH853> the mercy seat<WH3727> upon<WH5921> the ark<WH727> of the testimony<WH5715> in the most holy<WH6944> <WH6944> place.

And thou shalt set<WH7760> <WH853> the table<WH7979> without<WH4480> <WH2351> the veil,<WH6532> and the candlestick<WH4501> over against<WH5227> the table<WH7979> on<WH5921> the side<WH6763> of the tabernacle<WH4908> toward the south:<WH8486> and thou shalt put<WH5414> the table<WH7979> on<WH5921> the north<WH6828> side.<WH6763>

And thou shalt make<WH6213> a hanging<WH4539> for the door<WH6607> of the tent,<WH168> of blue,<WH8504> and purple,<WH713> and scarlet,<WH8438> <WH8144> and fine twined linen,<WH8336> <WH7806> wrought with needlework.<WH4639> <WH7551>

And thou shalt make<WH6213> for the hanging<WH4539> five<WH2568> pillars<WH5982> of shittim<WH7848> wood, and overlay<WH6823> them with gold,<WH2091> and their hooks<WH2053> shall be of gold:<WH2091> and thou shalt cast<WH3332> five<WH2568> sockets<WH134> of brass<WH5178> for them.
